thread.title: Mode Among Top Supply Chain Partner Nominees
thread.title_full: Mode Among Top Supply Chain Partner Nominees - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Mode Among Top Supply Chain Partner Nominees
text:
Mode Transportation
DALLAS , Aug. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- SupplyChainBrain magazine, a leading supply chain management information resource, recently announced that Mode Transportation, a division of Hub Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: HUBG), has been nominated as one of the 100 Great Supply Chain Partners for 2015. The list is compiled solely based on entries voluntarily submitted to SupplyChainBrain.com, which conducted a six-month poll that asked industry professionals to nominate service providers whose technology, logistics, transportation or consulting solutions made a significant impact on that company's efficiency, customer service and overall supply chain performance in recent years.
Customer testimonials cited Mode's great service and rapid response as a determining factor. The Top 10 criteria for nomination are reliability, excellence, value, expertise, problem solving, continuous improvement, support, positive attitude, global reach and strong leadership.
"Our industry has never been more competitive, so to be recognized again this year as a leading provider is very rewarding," said Jim Damman , President at Mode Transportation. "With our diverse client base, keeping everything in sync can be a challenge, but our commitment to deliver customized services is paying off - for our company and our clients alike."
Nominations could only be made using the official web-enabled form, which required nominators to identify themselves, their position, their company, their email address and a phone number where they could be reached to verify their responses. For their nomination to be counted, the participants had to provide adequate information to verify their identity and their legitimate role in the industry. The list of the 100 companies that received the most nominations will appear in the July/August issue of SupplyChainBrain magazine. The entire list is also available for viewing now at http://www.supplychainbrain.com/content/fileadmin/images/PDFS/2015_PARTNERS_CHART.pdf .
About Mode Transportation
Mode Transportation is an asset-light third-party logistics company focused on delivering truckload, less-than-truckload, intermodal and international services. Mode Transportation encompasses a vast network of operations centers across North America to meet our customers' needs. Mode Transportation is headquartered in Dallas and is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Hub Group. For more information, visit www.modetransportation.com .
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mode-among-top-supply-chain-partner-nominees-300131378.html
